name: postman-pet-api-tests
description: This repository contains [Pet API](https://petstore.swagger.io/#/) REST API tests using [Postman](https://www.postman.com/) and command line [Newman](https://github.com/postmanlabs/newman)

scripts.dev:test: newman run --verbose --color on tests/pet_api.postman_collection.json -e env/dev.json -r cli,htmlextra

author: MaryaManjuInduri
